resources.string:
Android now automatically removes permissions for apps that have not been used recently. Keep Alive, once the settings are configured, does not need any further interaction and may have its permissions revoked.

To ensure that permissions are not revoked, please disable the \'Pause app activity if unused\' option for the Keep Alive app.

Android now automatically removes permissions for Apps that have not been used recently. Keep Alive, once the settings are configured, does not need any further interaction unless an Alert is triggered.

To ensure that permissions are not revoked, please navigate to the Permissions section for Keep Alive and disable the \'Remove permissions if app isn\'t used\' option.

Android now automatically removes permissions for Apps that have not been used recently. Keep Alive, once the settings are configured, does not need any further interaction unless an Alert is triggered.

To ensure that permissions are not revoked, please disable the \'Remove permissions and free up space\' option for the Keep Alive app.

Android now automatically removes permissions for Apps that have not been used recently. Keep Alive, once the settings are configured, does not need any further interaction unless an Alert is triggered.

To ensure that permissions are not revoked, please disable the \'Remove permissions if app isn\'t used\' option.
Last activity detected at: %1$s\nNext activity check in: %2$s hours and %3$s minutes
Monitoring is not active.\nClick the button to restart it.
Monitoring is enabled but no activity has been detected in the last %1$s hours. Please ensure you have a lock screen enabled and have granted Usage access permissions.
Monitoring is enabled but not all permissions have been granted. Please click the "Grant Permissions" button below.
The message cannot be more than 160 characters.
Please enter a valid phone number.
Interval must be at least 10 minutes.
A phone call will be made to:\n%1$s
SMS message(s) will be sent to:\n%1$s
Unable to send SMS\nPlease verify you have an active SIM
No Emergency Contacts have been configured
Are you sure you want to delete this entry?
Sent when an SMS alert is triggered
Sent when an Phone Call alert is triggered
Glad to see you are still alive! Cancelling Alert.
Click here if you are still alive! Otherwise an alert will be sent in %1$s minutes.
A phone call has been placed to your emergency contact: %1$s
An SMS has been sent to your emergency contact(s)!
Error occurred while attempting to send Alert SMS
Error occurred while attempting to send Alert SMS: %1$s
Error occurred while attempting to send Alert SMS, please verify you have an active SIM
Failed to send Keep Alive Alert SMS?!
Unable to geocode location. GPS coordinates are (%1$s, %2$s). Accuracy (m): %3$s.

Set a range of time during which inactivity will not be counted. For example, with \'Hours of Inactivity\' set at 6 hours and a Rest Period of 22:00 – 6:00, if the device is last used at 18:00, the \'Are you there?\' check would not be sent until 8:00.\n\nNOTE: An alert can still be sent during a rest period if the \'Are you there?\' check was sent BEFORE the start of a rest period.
Times use the system default timezone: %1$s
Start and End times cannot be the same
The # of hours of inactivity before you will be prompted with an \'Are you there?\' notification.\n\nNOTE: This timing is not exact and the system may delay this notification by up to 1 hour.
The # of minutes to wait after sending a \'Are you there?\' notification before an Alert will be sent to your Emergency Contact(s)

When an Alert is triggered, a phone call will be placed to this phone number with speakerphone enabled.\n\nPlease note that this requires additional permissions so that phone calls can be placed from the background.
Hello! I have not used my phone in a while and may be in need of assistance. Please send help!
Hey I may be dead, if I do not contact you in the next 24 hours, you know what to do...
Select 1 or more apps on your device
Usage of the selected app(s) will be used to determine when your device was last interacted with
These events may not always be a result of user activity. Please review them carefully before choosing this app.

Your device is running Android 8 or earlier. In order to use Keep Alive you must first select the other app(s) that will be used to monitor for activity. Please click the Monitoring Method setting to configure.

Please keep in mind that this feature is in beta testing and behavior may differ depending on the app(s) selected. Keep Alive looks for a MOVE_TO_FOREGROUND event from the app(s), which is not always a result of user interaction. Apps that may be able to wake up your device, like Alarm, Phone or Media apps, should not be used.
\n\nNOTE: This device is running Android 9 or later, usage of device lock/unlock events instead of app monitoring is highly recommended.
In order to configure this setting you must first grant the Usage Stats permission. Please click the back button to return to the main page and click the \'Grant Permissions\' button.
Are you sure you want to delete all saved logs?
SMS is used as the primary notification method when an Alert is triggered.
An Emergency Contact Call Phone Number has been provided, which requires the ability to place a phone call.
In order to determine when your device was last used, a special permission called Usage Access Stats is required.\n\nPlease enable this permission for the Keep Alive app.

An Emergency Contact Call Phone Number has been provided, which requires the ability to place a phone call from the background.\n\nPlease enable the Manage Overlay permission for the Keep Alive app in your device settings.

\'Include Location Information\' is enabled, which requires the ability to obtain precise location information so that it is as accurate as possible, which can assist your emergency contact in locating you.
Notifications are only sent when an Alert is triggered

\'Include Location Information\' is enabled, which requires the ability to obtain location information while running in the background. Location is only obtained when an Alert is triggered, the conditions of which should only occur when the app is in the background and the device is idle. Please enable this permission for the Keep Alive app in your device settings by selecting \'Allow all the time\'.

Scheduling alarms is required so that the Alert can trigger even when your device is sleeping or in Do Not Disturb mode.\n\nPlease enable this permission for the KeepAlive app in your device settings.
Doing periodic check, alarm stage is %1$s
Getting SMS manager with context.getSystemService and sub id %1$d
Getting default SMS manager for sub id %1$d
Sending multipart SMS message with %1$d parts
Failed sending location SMS message to %1$s!?
Unable to place call, don\'t have permissions?!
checking for activity starting at %1$s local time
no events found in the last %1$.2f hours, sending Are you there? notification
Failed while attempting to get and send location alert
Last usage event was %1$s from %2$s at %3$s
Setting new periodic alarm for approximately %1$s
Setting final exact alarm to go off at %1$s
Unable to set exact alarm?! Setting normal final alarm to go off at %1$s
This is API 22 but we weren\'t able to set an exact alarm?!
Device is in idle mode, not getting current location
Don\'t have location permission, executing callback
best lastKnownLocation is from provider %1$s with accuracy %2$f
Timeout reached while getting location from google play?!
Failed while trying to get the %1$s location
No alarm found or monitoring is disabled
No events found, may not have lock screen?
No active alarm found, showing button to restart
Failed to get SMS manager? Disabling SMS test button
Current alarm set for %1$s local time
App is not enabled, why did the alarm go off?!
Time is %1$s, alarm was supposed to go off at %2$s, which was %3$d seconds ago
